attributes.action: Tell us if you were affronted by David Nicholsons appearance on Newsnight, talking about the NHS?
attributes.additional_details: Here is a man complicit in the murder of over a thousand people at the Stafford Hospital being given taxpayer funded airtime by the BBC.  Surely, knowing what we know he did to those unfortunate NHS victims, we should not have his presence nor his repulsive image forced upon us by an organisation which, itself, is known to be complicit in much of the damage being caused to the taxpaying population of the country.  Criminals ganging up against the people - with politicians supporting them in that - is brought to mind.
